description: large studio with queen bed, couch and full kitchen with great amenities.  Great full bath with great light.   The studio is spotless clean and in the best location on the upper east side.    Sleeps up to 2.
name: Upper East studio with everything
review: Our weekend trip to NYC was spectacular and our stay at Cathy's place was part of what made it all so great. The location is ideal, close to restaurants, subway, and Central Park. The apartment was comfortable and Cathy even supplied shampoo, soap, and towels. I would stay there again!
